title: What Varus could of potentially looked like if he had traditional Darkin colours
body:
NOTE: This post wasn't created to judge the design of the current Varus visuals, but only to showcase what he could of alternatively looked like, if he also had the similar pattern of Red that each Darkin appears to share.

https://i.imgur.com/z6Bfs86.png

###**Red Version**

https://i.imgur.com/bbVK8dr.png

###**Normal Version**

replies.body:
Interesting, though I prefer Varus' classic coloring.

It's not similar to Aatrox and Rhaast's, but it's unique and fitting for the champion. Color-coding factions and related characters isn't necessarily a good thing.
I know, I like it too. But I just wanted to share this alternative version with those who would want to see something close to it.
